channel.title: emmanuelfages on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in emmanuelfages on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.3.0 is available!
item.description: Dear community, it is a great day for us all. Many “when will it be released?” later, we are thrilled to announce the birth of PrestaShop 1.7.3! After six months of blood, sweat, and tears (okay, we’re just kidding), here it is, the new minor version has come. We are aware that these six months of work have raised some very high expectations. You won’t be disappointed, because we have spent a lot of time improving and testing it for you!

item.title: Stock management in PrestaShop 1.7 - part 4
item.description: In the previous posts, we spoke about our motivations for designing a new stock management system and how we’ve built it in the 1.7.2 release. We also described in depth the features and the technology used in these new interfaces. Now it’s time to tell you about the forthcoming advanced features of stock management! The current state of stock management in PS 1.7 If you’ve followed the evolution of the stock management in 1.
